description: This file defines a 'RecipeCard' component for a LightningJS application, responsible for rendering recipe information such as image, title, and description, and handling navigation on focus.

classes.name: RecipeCard
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays a recipe card with image, title, description, and handles navigation when focused.

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Sets the hovered state to true, typically called when the component gains focus.

methods.name: unfocus
methods.description: Sets the hovered state to false, called when the component loses focus.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Handles 'enter' input; navigates to the detailed recipe page if recipe ID exists.
